features: EXPERT REPAIRING FORMULA: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5 Repairing Conditioner for silky, healthy, stronger, supple, and easy to style hair* *with system
CARING INGREDIENTS: Formulated with caring ingredients, featuring up to 9percent Repair Concentrate with Protein for silky, healthy-looking hair
INDULGENT EXPERIENCE: Neither too rich nor too light, Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo and Repairing Conditioner create a perfect synergy of intense care without the weigh down
IRRESISTIBLE FRAGRANCE: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5’s offers a sophisticated floral, creamy blend with juicy green notes
COMPLETE REPAIRING SYSTEM: Maximize results by using with the L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo and Total Repair 5 Power Restore Multi-Use Treatment
body.description: L'Oreal Paris Total Repair 5 conditioner helps repair the five visible signs of damaged hair. The results? 1) Rebuilt fibers 2) Strength 3) Vitality 4) Silkiness and 5) Shine. Our strengthening system conditions with Protein + Ceramide and helps fortify each strand, reinforcing hair fiber and sealing-in nourishment. For best results, use L'Oreal Paris Total Repair 5 shampoo and conditioner together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With Protein + Ceramide Elixirs To Fight 5 Signs Of Damage* Revive damaged hair with Elvive Total Repair 5 Shampoo and Conditioner. Our strengthening system, with protein + ceramide elixirs, helps fortify each strand, reinforcing hair fiber and sealing in nourishment to help repair the five visible signs of damaged hair*: 1) split ends 2) weakness 3) roughness 4) dullness and 5) dehydration. *With System.

Repairing Shampoo and Conditioner Luxurious, reviving formula that helps repair fibers for healthier looking hair. Repairs 5 signs of damaged hair for 1) rebuilt fibers 2) strength 3) vitality 4) silkiness and 5) shine.* Hair strengthening formula with clinically tested results. *When using complete system of shampoo + conditioner.

Total Repair 5 Shampoo Wonder Water Total Repair 5 Conditioner Total Repair 5 Balm Protein Recharge Step Shampoo Boost Condition Treat Protect Benefit Cleanses & Repairs Damaged Hair Instantly transforms hair in just 8 seconds: for silkier, smoother, healthier-looking hair Provides Intense care with lightness Fortifies hair to strengthen vs. future damage Reduces breakage & protect against heat up to 450F How To Massage on wet hair. Lather. Rinse Apply to wet hair on lengths, avoid scalp. Massage for 8 seconds & rinse Apply to wet lengths. Leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse Rinse Out: Apply to wet hair, massage through ends. Leave on for 1 minute. Rinse. Leave in: Apply on dry or wet hair Apply to wet hair. Do not rinse. Style as usual Ingredient 2% Repair Concentrate with Protein Amino Acid + Protein 9% Repair Concentrate with Protein 91g Repair Concentrate with Protein per jar Almond Oil + Protein Scent Sophisticated floral blend balanced with juicy green notes Gourmand fruity blend balanced with precious white musks and delicate floral notes Sophisticated floral blend balanced with juicy green notes Sophisticated floral blend balanced with juicy green notes Sophisticated floral blend balanced with juicy green notes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Budget Haircare
reviews.reviewText: Normally, I use a pretty expensive salon shampoo and conditioner. But then I took up swimming, and it drastically increased the amount of conditioner I use. If you know, you know. I got this one to use for detangling and/or when I know I'm going to be right back in the pool later, so there is really no point.It's performed better than any drugstore conditioner I've tried, and almost as good as my favorite salon brand. I actually gave up on using my salon brand entirely, since I'm basically always going right back into the water. Along with the coordinating elvive protein cream leave in and a chlorine removing shampoo, my hair is doing surprisingly well.Absolutely would recommend to anyone with damaged hair and on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my conditioner from now on!
reviews.reviewText: Has really helped my hair! I have much less breakage and my hair is so soft and shiny. Bought it for my sister and she loves it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softens the Curls!
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry, thick, naturally curly long hair. Has been damaged by medications etc. Tried this based on several reviews as most all other products used in past only work ok. This made a HUGE difference! Gave my hair a softer feeling, shine and ends that are really damaged and need trimming actually look better! Curls are so nice and dry same way without being weighed down by oils etc. Really helps in higher humidity to not get super frizzy as of right now. Not getting a ton of high humidity days right now but happy with current results. The scent doesn’t seem overpowering. Reminds me close to a faint almond scent which doesn’t last. Just feels clean and soft. Easy to comb:brush wet without damages. Great value for the price and doesn’t take a large quantity of product either. Very thick and creamy so works well into the hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR OILY HAIR AND
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is one of the few shampoos that actually untangle my hair in the shower. I have very curly hair and this makes it very smooth not only in the shower but after as well. I am impressed and will definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great har product
reviews.reviewText: Had purchased a small container of this product and loved it, so ordered a large container for me and one for a friend. My hair is fine and after a shampoo it is a tangled mess. Just a tiny pea size use of this will remove the tangles. Will use forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comparable to it's a 10
reviews.reviewText: I usually use it's a 10 hair mask when I wash my hair but switched over to this and I would argue it is super similar. it has a lot of slip from the silicone and smooths out my frizzy hair. it smells really nice too, not too overpowering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for Colored Hair
reviews.reviewText: It’s the only conditioner that I use. I’ve tried a lot, and this one leaves my treated hair soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells super strong!
reviews.reviewText: I have naturally straight, super long hair and this is pretty moisturizing. I have noticed a different in my ends when they dry. They aren’t as frizzy. But the smell of this conditioner has such a strong cheap perfume scent!! I almost got a headache the first time I used it. I can’t imagine that being good for your hair.

Llego solo un día después super a tiempo, y lo mejor en una caja y el acondicionador sellado con una cinta para que no se derramará, ya lo use y quedo mi cabello muy ligero, le quito pesadez, se siente muy bien ya qué lo tengo decolorado, es un muy buen acondicionador si lo complementas con el shampoo.
I searched so many conditioner. But this is best for curly frizzzy hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 16, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Very good at hydrating relaxed hair
Deja el cabello súper suave y brillante, huele delicioso y el tamaño es extra. Uno de los mejores productores para el cabello!
A mi.esposa.le.encanto para compaginarlo con el Shampoo de la misma marca comprada
